alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi; Meeker; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 1:18PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Meeker, southeastern Kandiyohi and northeastern Renville Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 118 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Cosmos, or 20 miles southeast of Willmar, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Litchfield, Atwater and Grove City around 135 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Watkins. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 83 and 108. U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 87 and 93. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 105 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
